name: BS Super Mario Collection: Dai-4-shuu
overview: BS Super Mario Collection is a remake of Super Mario Collection for the Satellaview. The game was released in four installments as a Soundlink game entry. Dai-4-shuu: Mario transverses a SMB3-like overworld to enter worlds from the Lost Levels, or Japan's SMB2. Worlds 1 through 5 are initially accessible.
